PORED SW TESTIRAN JE HAZARD ZA LW
addi x3 x0 10
addi x4 x0 10
nop
nop
sw x3 4(x0)
nop
nop
nop
lw x5 4(x0)
add x11 x5 x4

Komentar: MORAJU NOP JER IMA HAZARDI I ZA SW KOJE BI TREBALO ISPRAVITI!
------------------*----------------*-*-*-*-*-*-*---*
addi x3 x0 10
addi x4 x0 10
auipc x5 10
addi x5 x5 1

00000000101000000000000110010011
00000000101000000000001000010011
00000000000000001010001010010111
00000000000100101000001010010011

-***************--------------------------------
TESTIRAN HAZARD
addi x3 x0 10
addi x4 x0 10
addi x12 x12 10
beq x3 x4 L1
addi x8 x8 4
L1: addi x9 x9 4

00000000101001100000011000010011

TESTIRAN UPRAVLJACKI HAZARD
addi x3 x0 10
addi x4 x0 10
beq x3 x4 L1
addi x8 x8 4
L1: addi x9 x9 4

00000000101000000000000110010011
00000000101000000000001000010011
00000000010000011000010001100011

TESTIRAN KOMPLIKOVANIJI UPRAVLJACKI HAZARD
addi x3 x0 10
addi x4 x0 10
nop
nop
sw x3 4(x0)
nop
nop
nop
lw x5 4(x0)
beq x3 x5 L1
addi x9 x9 10
L1: addi x10 x10 14
